title: Some Pretty Skinny Women yes
review: But it is a horrid display of touristic propaganda at its best Simply calling something a romance doesn't make it one. You actually need to supply romance and feelings, not a handful of obvious biased opinions. Very see-through if you've ever actually done something romantic. Poor job, shame on the studio for allowing this tripe.

title: The Only Thing This Film Had Going For It Were the Women
review:
They were not low-brow and trashy and did not have neck tattoos and calf tattoos and nose rings and so on and so forth.

Otherwise, the story was shallow and clearly a product placement exercise by Singapore tourism.

title: Not A Film For Me
review:
I wasted my money and should not have watched it.

Everything I hate is in this film: backstabbing, lying, gold diggers, people who think wealth and being rich is cool, Christians, piano music etc. etc.
